name: Censer of Serenity
description: This ornate mace doubles as a swinging censer. Instead of striking enemies, it releases pulses of radiant mist that calm and heal. Designed for peacekeepers and support clerics.

name: Bloodbite
description: A brutal single-headed axe with jagged edges and a leather-wrapped handle still stained red from ancient hunts. It hums when near battle.

name: Dagger of the Last Breath
description: A thin, blackened blade forged with cold iron. Its edge seems to disappear when held still.

name: Oathbound Shield
description: A white and gold kite shield, etched with the symbol of a broken chain.

name: Rime-Touched Sword
description: A steel blade that leaves a brief trail of frost when swung.

name: Ghoststep Boots
description: Boots made of gray leather and stitched with spectral sinew.

name: Thunderjaw Maul
description: This oversized hammer crackles with latent thunder magic.

name: Chainmail of the Stalwart
description: Forged by dwarves, reinforced with adamantine rivets.

name: Twinfang Blades
description: Forged to be used together. When both blades hit the same target, they empower each other.

name: Verdant Thornbow
description: Grown from living wood, this bow hums softly with druidic energy.

name: Helm of Clear Thought
description: A steel helm inlaid with blue crystals. It feels cool against the head.

name: Spitefang Spear
description: A black iron spear tipped with fang-shaped obsidian. Favored by vengeful warriors.

name: The Gambler’s Dagger
description: A sleek blade engraved with dice and cards. Slightly curved, made for duels and bluffs.

name: Stormfang Bolts (Bundle of 5)
description: These steel bolts crackle faintly with static. When fired, they leave a faint trail of blue sparks.

name: The Barkskin Cloak
description: Made of interwoven bark and moss from a treant’s grove. Offers living protection.

name: Shield of Echoing Steel
description: A solid metal shield with a faint resonance when struck. Echoes aid in combat awareness.
